content:
TextLine Class

Definition

Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.

In this Article

public abstract class TextLine : IDisposable
Inheritance
System.Object
TextLine

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Constructors

TextLine()

Initializes a new instance of the TextLine class.

protected TextLine ();

TextLine(Double)

Initializes a new instance of the TextLine class.

protected TextLine (double pixelsPerDip);
pixelsPerDip
Double

pixelsPerDip should be set to the TextSource's PixelsPerDip value.

Remarks

This constructor must be called for every class that is inherited from TextLine.

Properties

Baseline

Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the current TextLine object.

public abstract double Baseline { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the baseline distance.

DependentLength

Gets the number of characters following the last character of the line that may trigger reformatting of the current line.

public abstract int DependentLength { get; }
Value
Int32

An Int32 value that represents the number of characters.

Extent

Gets the distance from the top-most to bottom-most black pixel in a line.

public abstract double Extent { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the extent distance.

HasCollapsed

Gets a value that indicates whether the line is collapsed.

public abstract bool HasCollapsed { get; }
Value
Boolean

true, if the line is collapsed; otherwise, false.

HasOverflowed

Gets a value that indicates whether content of the line overflows the specified paragraph width.

public abstract bool HasOverflowed { get; }
Value
Boolean

true, it the line overflows the specified paragraph width; otherwise, false.

Height

Gets the height of a line of text.

public abstract double Height { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the text line height.

IsTruncated

Determines whether the text line is truncated in the middle of a word.

public virtual bool IsTruncated { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the text line is truncated in the middle of a word; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The IsTruncated property value is set only when the TextWrapping property of TextParagraphProperties is set to TextWrapping, and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width. In such situation, TextFormatter truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by TextWrapping setting.

Length

Gets the total number of TextSource positions of the current line.

public abstract int Length { get; }
Value
Int32

An Int32 value that represents the total number of TextSource positions of the current line.

MarkerBaseline

Gets the distance from the edge of the line's highest point to the baseline marker of the line.

public abstract double MarkerBaseline { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the baseline distance of the marker.

MarkerHeight

Gets the height of a marker for a list item.

public abstract double MarkerHeight { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the height of the marker.

NewlineLength

Gets the number of newline characters at the end of a line.

public abstract int NewlineLength { get; }
Value
Int32

An Int32 value that represents the number of newline characters.

OverhangAfter

Gets the distance that black pixels extend beyond the bottom alignment edge of a line.

public abstract double OverhangAfter { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the overhang after distance.

OverhangLeading

Gets the distance that black pixels extend prior to the left leading alignment edge of the line.

public abstract double OverhangLeading { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the overhang leading distance.

OverhangTrailing

Gets the distance that black pixels extend following the right trailing alignment edge of the line.

public abstract double OverhangTrailing { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the overhang trailing distance.

PixelsPerDip

Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.

public double PixelsPerDip { get; set; }
Value
Double

The current PixelsPerDip value.

Start

Gets the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.

public abstract double Start { get; }
Value
Double

A Double value that represents the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.

TextBaseline

Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the line of text.

public abstract double TextBaseline { get; }
Value
Double

A Double value that represents the text baseline distance.

TextHeight

Gets the height of the text and any other content in the line.

public abstract double TextHeight { get; }
Value
Double

A Double value.

Remarks

The TextHeight may differ from the Height property if the client specified the line height.

TrailingWhitespaceLength

Gets the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.

public abstract int TrailingWhitespaceLength { get; }
Value
Int32

An Int32 value that represents the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.

Width

Gets the width of a line of text, excluding trailing whitespace characters.

public abstract double Width { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the text line width, excluding trailing whitespace characters.

WidthIncludingTrailingWhitespace

Gets the width of a line of text, including trailing whitespace characters.

public abstract double WidthIncludingTrailingWhitespace { get; }
Value
Double

A Double that represents the text line width, including trailing whitespace characters.

Methods

Collapse(TextCollapsingProperties[])

Create a collapsed line based on collapsed text properties.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine Collapse (System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties[] collapsingPropertiesList);
collapsingPropertiesList
TextCollapsingProperties[]

A list of TextCollapsingProperties objects that represent the collapsed text properties.

Returns
TextLine

A TextLine value that represents a collapsed line that can be displayed.

Dispose()

Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the TextFormatter object.

public abstract void Dispose ();

Draw(DrawingContext,Point,InvertAxes)

Renders the TextLine object based upon the specified DrawingContext.

public abstract void Draw (System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext drawingContext, System.Windows.Point origin, System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes inversion);
drawingContext
DrawingContext

The DrawingContext object onto which the TextLine is rendered.

origin
Point

A Point value that represents the drawing origin.

inversion
InvertAxes

An enumerated InvertAxes value that indicates the inversion of the horizontal and vertical axes of the drawing surface.

GetBackspaceCaretCharacterHit(CharacterHit)

Gets the previous character hit after backspacing.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetBackspaceCaretCharacterHit (System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit characterHit);
characterHit
CharacterHit

The current CharacterHit object.

Returns
CharacterHit

The CharacterHit object after backspacing.

GetCharacterHitFromDistance(Double)

Gets the character hit corresponding to the specified distance from the beginning of the line.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetCharacterHitFromDistance (double distance);
distance
Double

A Double value that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.

Returns
CharacterHit

The CharacterHit object at the specified distance from the beginning of the line.

Remarks

The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.

GetDistanceFromCharacterHit(CharacterHit)

Gets the distance from the beginning of the line to the specified character hit.

public abstract double GetDistanceFromCharacterHit (System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit characterHit);
characterHit
CharacterHit

The CharacterHit object whose distance you want to query.

Returns
Double

A Double that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.

Remarks

The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.

GetIndexedGlyphRuns()

Gets an enumerator for enumerating IndexedGlyphRun objects in the TextLine.

public abstract System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> GetIndexedGlyphRuns ();
Returns
IEnumerable<IndexedGlyphRun>

An enumerator that allows you to enumerate each IndexedGlyphRun object in the TextLine.

Remarks

By enumerating through the list of IndexedGlyphRun objects, the text layout client can obtain glyph information for each text source character.

GetNextCaretCharacterHit(CharacterHit)

Gets the next character hit for caret navigation.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetNextCaretCharacterHit (System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit characterHit);
characterHit
CharacterHit

The current CharacterHit object.

Returns
CharacterHit

The next CharacterHit object based on caret navigation.

GetPreviousCaretCharacterHit(CharacterHit)

Gets the previous character hit for caret navigation.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetPreviousCaretCharacterHit (System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit characterHit);
characterHit
CharacterHit

The current CharacterHit object.

Returns
CharacterHit

The previous CharacterHit object based on caret navigation.

GetTextBounds(Int32,Int32)

Gets an array of bounding rectangles that represent the range of characters within a text line.

public abstract System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds> GetTextBounds (int firstTextSourceCharacterIndex, int textLength);
firstTextSourceCharacterIndex
Int32

An Int32 value that represents the index of first character of specified range.

textLength
Int32

An Int32 value that represents the number of characters of the specified range.

Returns
IList<TextBounds>

A list of TextBounds objects representing the bounding rectangle.

GetTextCollapsedRanges()

Gets a collection of collapsed text ranges after a line has been collapsed.

public abstract System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange> GetTextCollapsedRanges ();
Returns
IList<TextCollapsedRange>

A list of TextCollapsedRange objects that represent the collapsed text.

GetTextLineBreak()

Gets the state of the line when broken by line breaking process.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak GetTextLineBreak ();
Returns
TextLineBreak

A TextLineBreak value that represents the line break.

Remarks

The return value is null when the line ends at the end of the paragraph.

The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the FormatLine method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.

GetTextRunSpans()

Gets a collection of TextRun objects in a text span that are contained within a line.

public abstract System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSpan<System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>> GetTextRunSpans ();
Returns
IList<TextSpan<TextRun>>

Gets a list of TextRun objects contained within a text span.
